author: Liza Lin, Chong Koh Ping
title: Singapore Built a Coronavirus App, but It Hasn’t Worked So Far - The Wall Street Journal
description:
1. Singapore Built a Coronavirus App, but It Hasn’t Worked So Far  The Wall Street Journal

  3. Almost 2 billion users will miss out on Google and Apple’s contact tracing system  T…
content:
SINGAPOREAs governments around the world race to roll out contact-tracing phone apps to fight the coronavirus pandemic, an early experiment in Singapore faces a big hurdle: getting people to sign up.
The government-developed app, called TraceTogether, is des… [+231 chars]
